About Us

Who We Are

The Pangolins is a youth-led entrepreneur support company headquartered in Blantyre, Malawi. We exist to design, implement, and scale entrepreneurship ecosystems that drive sustainable economic growth and job creation. Our work spans business development services, digital infrastructure design, strategic media, and investment facilitation. By bridging the gap between startups, investors, and policy actors, we are building a resilient entrepreneurial economy aligned with Malawi 2063 and the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

Our Story

Founded in 2022, The Pangolins emerged as a response to the lack of structured business support for Malawi‚Äôs young entrepreneurs. What began as a small idea to provide business documentation, access to business information and mentorship has evolved into a national platform driving entrepreneurship, innovation, and investment readiness. Our name, The Pangolins, draws inspiration from one of the world‚Äôs rarest and most resilient animals ‚Äî a pangolin (Ngaka, in local language) a symbol of protection, adaptability, and value. Just as the pangolin adapts to survive, our organization adapts to Malawi‚Äôs dynamic entrepreneurship landscape ‚Äî protecting, nurturing, and empowering local innovators to thrive.

Our Vision

A Malawi where youth-led enterprises are the backbone of inclusive economic growth and innovation.

Our Mission

To empower entrepreneurs through accessible services, partnerships, and digital solutions that drive sustainable business growth and systemic change.

Core Values

Sustainability ‚Äì We build ventures that endure. Tailored Solutions ‚Äì We meet entrepreneurs where they are. Inclusivity ‚Äì We create opportunities for all. Innovation ‚Äì We champion creativity and progress

Entrepreneurs transition from survival mode to sustainable growth.

A resilient, inclusive, and industrialized entrepreneurial ecosystem drives national prosperity.

Our Core Offerings

Business Development & Consulting

Business planning, Strategy design, Talent development, and incubation support for startups and SMEs.

Media & Storytelling

Through Pangolins TV and digital media, we amplify entrepreneurs‚Äô stories and connect them to opportunities.

Technology for Enterprise

Digital systems, CRM tools, and tech-enabled business support solutions for organizational strengthening.

Finance & Investment

Linking entrepreneurs to investors, managing rent-to-own programs, and curating growth capital.

Why Partner With The Pangolins?

Systems That Power Enterprise Growth

The Pangolins is an enterprise development firm dedicated to designing ecosystems that enable small and growing businesses to scale sustainably. We bridge entrepreneurs, investors, and institutions through data-driven insights, business infrastructure, and strategic consulting.

Systems-Led Approach

We design scalable enterprise systems that make entrepreneurship efficient, investable, and sustainable.

Proven Ecosystem Experience

Our leadership and partners bring cross-sector experience in finance, enterprise development, and digital systems.

Tailored Business Infrastructure

We deliver context-specific solutions‚Äîfrom compliance systems to market linkages and investment readiness tools.

Integrity & Transparency

Our engagements are grounded in transparent frameworks and measurable outcomes. We believe credibility is capital.

FAQ

Here are some of our Frequently Asked Questions. If you have any other questions you‚Äôd like answered please feel free to email us.

The Pangolins is an organization that aims at reducing unemployment rates in Malawi by promoting entrepreneurship and closing the gap thus prevalent between investors and young creators in Malawi.

Anyone who has a business, established or emerging including those with defined ideas.

Our interest rates are negotiable depending on number of factors such as collateral, period and whether or not the business is established.

For unsecured, minimum is MWK50,000.00 and maximum is MWK1,000,000.00 while for secured, minimum is MWK50,000 and maximum is MWK10,000,000.00

The very first step is to contact The Pangolins for application form of a service you're looking for. Submit your completed form. Lastly, The Pangolins will call you for further review of your eligibility
